Question: Is he sitting down?

Reference Answer: yes

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/330348.jpg

Original program:

```
BOX0=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='person')
IMAGE0=CROP_BELOW(image=IMAGE,box=BOX0)
BOX1=LOC(image=IMAGE0,object='chair')
ANSWER0=COUNT(box=BOX1)
ANSWER1=EVAL(expr="'yes' if {ANSWER0} > 0 else 'no'")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER1)
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question="Is he sitting down?")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Is he sitting down?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>yes</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>yes</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: Yes
